Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

I just did a fresh install of my KSP and put the GameData and Saves folders back, but I am missing all my custom/favorite parts folders I made. Does anyone know where these are saved in the KSP folder?

- - - Updated - - -

Nevermind ((( looking for 20 minutes, give up, ask on the forum, 10 seconds later find the .cfg file... story of my life... It's in the GamePlay/Squad/PartsList folder if anyone else should ask
